skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
This one is no apprentice in the black arts but a master of Necromancy and Dark Magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Vlad is borne to battle by powerful, dark effluvia, moving with a speed beyond mortal perception.
Vlad shares his aberrant immortality with those he trusts, ensuring his legacy endures eternally.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +125
	(own armies in province)

Unit experience gain per turn: +125
	(all armies factionwide)

Unit experience gain per turn: +250
	(own armies in province)

Unit experience gain per turn: +250
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord of the von Carsteins exudes a distracting and sensational air, giving all before him pause.

effects.description: Improves "Aura of Dark Grandeur" with a penalty to enemy melee attack

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description: Improves "Aura of Dark Grandeur" with a penalty to enemy melee attack

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: It takes a combination of madness, desperation and an iron stomach to be levied alongside the living dead.

effects.description:
Range: +20% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(own army)

Missile strength: +20% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(own army)

Range: +40% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(own army)

Missile strength: +40% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Come, my night-shape servants, we have a great work ahead of us."
Skill honed by centuries, strength tempered by blood.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. Here, his magic is used to summon a Varghulf, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
